author: Buddha
message: In a controversy the instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sydney Smith
message: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little do what you can.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: When you see a man of worth, think of how you may emulate him. When you see one who is unworthy, examine yourself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mary Kay Ash
message: Aerodynamically the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know that so it goes on flying anyway.
title: Thought of the day
